context: A security incident reported suspicious sequence of exploration activities where a process called a set of Windows commands. These commands can be used by attackers to identify assets of value and coordinate lateral movement after compromising a machine. Several instances of `net.exe` and `whoami.exe` commands were executed within a short period of time.
question: As part of the same security incident, a known credential theft tool was executed. Can you identify the name of the tool used for credential theft?
solution_steps: A process `powershell.exe` conducted a sequence of suspicious exploration activities on 2024-07-04 22:35:02.508708+00:00.
A malicious credential theft tool `mimikatz.exe` was executed on 2024-07-04 22:35:00.823035+00:00.
